00039 /* returns positive nonzero on error */
00040 int bmesh_elem_check(void *element, const char htype);
00041 
00042 #define BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(el)                                                  \
00043     if (bmesh_elem_check(el, ((BMHeader *)el)->htype)) {                      \
00044         printf("check_element failure, with code %i on line %i in file\n"     \
00045         "    \"%s\"\n\n",                                                     \
00046         bmesh_elem_check(el, ((BMHeader *)el)->htype),                    \
00047         __LINE__, __FILE__);                                                  \
00048     }

00050 #define BM_DISK_EDGE_LINK_GET(e, v)  (                                        \
00051     ((v) == ((BMEdge *)(e))->v1) ?                                            \
00052         &((e)->v1_disk_link) :                                                \
00053         &((e)->v2_disk_link)                                                  \
00054     )

00060  * on using these internal flags!*/
00061 #define _FLAG_JF    1 /* join faces */
00062 #define _FLAG_MF    2 /* make face */

00064 #define BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_ENABLE(element, f)  ((element)->oflags[0].pflag |=  (f))
00065 #define BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_DISABLE(element, f) ((element)->oflags[0].pflag &= ~(f))
00066 #define BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_TEST(element, f)    ((element)->oflags[0].pflag &   (f))
